page.title: 03PEOPLE IN OUR AREA
page.content: Mrs Hashigan lives with her husband in a house just by Egglestone Abbey and the River Tees.She goes to work at the Bowes Museum in the Textiles Department.Her husband is a social worker for the Teesdale area.She has a five day week and works from 8:30am to 5:00pm.She spends most of her time answering questions asked by O level students.She thinks this area is a nice place to live in.All her shopping is done in Barnard Castle and sometimes in Darlington.Recently the Hashigans have been to France on {holiday}and plan to go to South West Scotland this August.They use electricity.For entertainment she and her husband go round to their friends for a drink. They own a car.She thinks this will be a good area for the child she is expecting to grow up in.
